defs: the Sun, as the well-wisher of the lotus.
Brahma, the lotus-born.
the universe created by the lotus-born, Brahma.
the friend of lotus, the sun.
a lotus-like faced woman; a beautiful woman.

the fine, dust-like mass of grains that are produced in the anthers or microspore sacs of lotus plants, containing the male sexual cells (gametophytes) of the plant; the lotus-pollen.

a multitude of lotus plants.

a period of (usu.) 12 months; a year.

accepted; agreed; admitted.

an opinion - a) a belief not based on absolute certainty or positive knowledge but on what seems true, valid or probable to one's own mind; judgment; b) the formal judgment of an expert on a matter in which advice is sought; c) the formal statement by a judge, court referee, etc. of the law bearing on a case.
that which is eagerly desired; liking; a sincere wish.
a respectable man.
a mystical or astronomical diagram, usu. on a thin metal sheet, used as amulet, which is supposed to yield one's wish.
that which is eagerly wished for.
a desire; longing; craving.
pride - a) an unduly high opinion of oneself; exaggerated self-esteem; conceit b) haughty behaviour resulting from this; arrogance.
respect, regard; esteem.
to accord consent; to agree; to approve.
the act of killing; slaughter; destruction.
a war - a) open armed conflict between countries or between factions within the same country; b) any active hostility, contention or struggle; conflict.
treachery in one's own camp; danger from within the party or group.
imprisonment; confinement.
a man who desperately takes on a dangerous fight for his survival.
proper respect for oneself; sense of one's own dignity or worth; self-respect; pride.
the quality or state of being arrogant; overbearing pride or self-importance; arrogance.
the act or fact of irritating or being irritated; harm; annoyance.
love; affection.
= ಅಭಿಮಾನಗೆಡು.
a damage to or an offence against, one's esteem, dignity or status etc.
a man who dislodges another from his self-assumed esteemed position; he who is terror for arrogant persons.
a man who deservedly claims the love and affection of another.
